message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
It's your turn to be fair, Alice.  Let's split it evenly.
I'll give you a bit more than before, but I still want the bigger share
The pot is shrinking, Alice.  I'll take the slightly larger share this time.
I'm willing to compromise, but still want a bit more
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. Take this offer or I'm aiming for an even bigger share next round.
